alert.note: Alert for Inland Volusia; Northern Lake County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued December 24 at 3:30AM EST until December 24 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EST THIS MORNING... ...HARD FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM EST SUNDAY... ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE SUNDAY NIGHT THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Freeze Warning, duration of freezing temperatures early this morning between 4 and 8 hours. For the Hard Freeze Warning tonight, duration of freezing temperatures between 6 and 12 hours, and duration of 27 or lower between 2 and 4 hours. For the Freeze Watch, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 29 possible. * WHERE...Inland Volusia and Northern Lake Counties. * WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, until 9 AM EST this morning. For the Hard Freeze Warning, from 11 PM this evening to 9 AM EST Sunday. For the Freeze Watch, from late Sunday night through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. Bring pets and potted plants indoors. Check on elderly neighbors to make sure their furnace is working.To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Cover above-ground exposed pipes to protect them from freezing.
